Our Services

Fusestar Electrical offers a full range of services to meet the electrical construction requirements on Commercial and Institutional Building Projects, as well as Automated Industrial and Process Plants. We also design, sell, install and service all types and sizes of electrical and communications systems. These include everything from your typical residential homes all the way to the largest industrial sites and everything in between.

Residential Electrical

Fusestar Electrical design an efficient residential electrical installation to meet your residential need with your 100% safety taken into consideration.

Commercial Services

At Fusestar Electrical our commercial services are directed to support the local community within our company for Low cost installation.

Industrial Service

Fusestar Electrical offers wide range of Industrial services ranging from specialized Automated Industrial Plants to Process Plants installations.

Electrical Security

Fusestar Electrical comply fully with Organisation Health Safety Agency (OHSA) for the security and safety of our clients. Your safety is our Pride.

Electrical Repair

Fusestar Electrical offers a 72 months electrical repairs to our clients on all complete installation done carried out by our experience personnel.

Electrical Support

At Fusestar Electrical we offer quick and full Electrical Support for all electrical your complaint call our customer free line today.

During our 10 years of electrical construction, we have finished every project undertaken. Our record of successful completions has resulted in a strong financial position, and an excellent relationship with our Banks and Bonding Agent.
